resources.string: You can\'t select more than one checkbox
You can\'t close the game with cards in your hand
You must have points in your hand to take the pots
What do you think about this app?
You will be redirected to the Play Store to write a review.\nThanks for your support
Read the score without any hassle
%1s is an easy buraco scorekeeper for your smartphone.\nIt\'s FREE, download it on Google Play Store %2s
If you leave the app without ending the game, you will receive a notification to continue the game
Enable or disable subtraction of points in hand
Input points of a single match directly \nOnly a field is available to input the sum of the points of a player. \nSuggested for experienced players
Suitable for newcomers, but not the fastest way \nInput points in a detailed form, with clean runs, semi-clean runs and dirty runs. You can even use only part of all the fields.

Only two fields: base points and table points \nBase points are the sum of the runs with the closing, subtracting points in hand (calculated by the user). Table points are the points of cards on the table.
To open the guide, you must be connected to the Internet
Permission denied to read your External storage
Permission denied to publish your score
To change names, just touch the player\'s name in the main screen
Would you like to send a report of what you don\'t like of this app?
More than a simple buraco scorekeeper!
You can easily share results with your friends on Facebook, Instagram, Whatsapp and other social networks

The app calculates the results automatically: you can just insert the number of runs, the points on the table and the (eventually) points in your hands. In the next section you can choose your favorite input method. If this is your first time, I suggest opt for the default option, you can easily change this behaviour later in Settings
This device is discoverable by nearby devices
Open %1s on another device and choose %2s from the menu to start playing together
Start a match on another device and choose \"Host this match\" from the three dots menu to start playing together
For privacy concerns, a notification is shown when the match is shared with nearby players

There was a problem trying to make this device discoverable to others.
Check if you were already hosting a match and try again.
Make sure you accept the Location permission for this app.
If the problem still occurs try to restart the app or the device itself
Permission denied to find nearby devices using location services
Anyone can join a match of another player but only a PRO user can host a match
To host a match and other cool features, you can upgrade to the PRO version using the button below

Are you a good buraco's player? You should upgrade to the PRO version of Points Buraco to enjoy an ad-free experience and some cool features. 

The PRO version includes: 

Invite friends to join your match 
Play a match together and see the results on different devices. Stop your friends from taking you smartphone to see the score. 
You can share your match with anyone within a range of 10 metres without using an Internet connection, so don't worry about your data plan! 
Your friends don't need to be a PRO user to join your matches 

Remove the ads 
Enjoy an ad-free experience during the game 

Access to all future PRO exclusive features 
This app is actively developed and I am working on new awesome features. You will get them as soon as they are available. 

Support the development 
There is only one person behind this app: I make huge efforts to bring to you the best Buraco scorekeeper of the Google Play Store 
At the price of a coffee you will help me working on new features.
You are now a PRO user\nA restart of the app is needed in order to unlock all the features and remove ads

Google Play Store is not available.\nTry to open the Google Play Store or restart the device If the problem persist, maybe your device is not Google Play certified: contact the manufacturer for more information
Google Play Store needs an update.\nTry to open Google Play Store and check for updates
Seems you haven\'t brought the PRO version before.\nIf you think this is a mistake, send an email to %1s
You don\'t seem to be connected to a network.\nTo upgrade to the PRO version an Internet connection is required
The requested product is not available to purchase
There was an error during the purchase: contact the developer at %1s
There was a generic error during the purchase
You already own the PRO version
This feature is available only for PRO users
